body:
Do you have an example of how I can convert a Tensor to a pointer to a host memory?

Currently, I use AsDeviceMemory() to convert a Tensor to a pointer to device memory; After I declare .HostMemory() for that tensor, I think I need to use another way to convert that to a pointer.
body_html:
Do you have an example of how I can convert a Tensor to a pointer to a host memory?

Currently, I use AsDeviceMemory() to convert a Tensor to a pointer to device memory; After I declare .HostMemory() for that tensor, I think I need to use another way to convert that to a pointer.
body_text:
Do you have an example of how I can convert a Tensor to a pointer to a host memory?
Currently, I use AsDeviceMemory() to convert a Tensor to a pointer to device memory; After I declare .HostMemory() for that tensor, I think I need to use another way to convert that to a pointer.
